Buy on PayPlux

To sell on PayPlux means simply exchange your digital currency of choice for
GHS, ie bitcoin, perfect money, ethereum, litecoin. You can also call it
liquidating your digital currency for cash.

What Can I Buy on
PayPlux?

PayPlux is a digital currency exchange that allows you to buy digital currencies including both crypto and non crypto assets. We have in stock:

1Bitcoin
2Perfect Money
3Litecoin
4Ethereum

Payment options

Buying from PayPlux can be done in various ways:

From your PayPlux Prepaid Wallet

Preload your PayPlux prepaid wallet with any amount and buy instantly from there when you need any digital currency.

With Mobile Money on all Networks

Place your order and make payments by sending the money from your mobile money on any network directly to PayPlux to complete your order.

Directly with USSD

Dial our PayPlux USSD app code and follow the options to make your order and get it delivered directly to you.

Bank Payments

For amounts beyond GHSxxxxxx, fill a KYC form and get the bank details for PayPlux to make your payments directly. You receive your order once payment has been confirmed successfully.

Automatic 24/7 payments

Place your orders and make payments with our third party Slydepay and Hubtel apps easily. Your buy order is processed instantly no matter the time of day.

The Process

Our process is very simple and easy to use.

1Choose digital currency to buy
2Complete the order details: amount to purchase, priority fees, etc.
3Choose preferred payment method
4Complete your order and wait for your account to be credited

Place your buy order right away!
